gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 111, Grizzlies 86
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeat the Grizzlies, 111-86.  Dennis Schroder recorded 18 points and five assists for the Nets in the victory, while Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 15 points and four rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort.  The Nets improve to 22-35 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 20-38.
